reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, soft, and comfortable.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bow tie sweater
items.body: Soft, warm, feminine. Ordering more in different colors. Sizing is good, highly recommended. Read more
items.author: Milo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect st patricks outfit
items.body: I was looking for something to wear for st patricks day this year since it was a little cooler. I tried on a few different options. But landed on this one for the really cute bow detail in the back. This was a little loose so if you want something tighter I would says size down from your normal size. I recieved so many compliments wearing this. The fabric is soft and comfortable to wear all day Read more
items.author: Julia Katherine

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So incredibly soft
items.body: Beautiful soft sweater. I ordered the Green in a size medium. It seems to run big. I will order another one but in a small. The flsweater is super soft. Love the bow on the back. I wore it to a Christmas party and the bow untied which made the top start to fall off but other than that super impressed with this beautiful sweater. I am 5â€™7â€ and about 170 lbs with a DD chest. Read more
items.author: Kelly LoTempio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute
items.body: The sweaters was great material and very cute but just didnt fit me how I wanted it to. When I sent it back my money was refunded immediately Read more
items.author: Brittany Matier

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice color.
items.body: Size ran a little big. Had to return because of size. Color was like the photo. Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Previously worn and returned
items.body: Love the sweater but it arrived and has clearly been worn and stuffed wrinkled in a bag smelling like perfume and covered with someone elseâ€™s hair. Gross. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Camel, Navyblue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
